products.name: Classic Oak Door
products.description: Handcrafted solid oak door with premium finish and elegant design.
products.longDescription: Our Classic Oak Door represents the pinnacle of traditional craftsmanship. Each door is meticulously handcrafted from premium solid oak, known for its exceptional durability and timeless beauty. The natural grain patterns are enhanced with our proprietary finishing process, creating a warm, inviting appearance that will elevate any space in your home.

products.name: Modern Walnut Entry Door
products.description: Contemporary walnut door with sleek lines and minimalist hardware.
products.longDescription: Our Modern Walnut Entry Door combines contemporary design with exceptional craftsmanship. Made from premium walnut wood, this door features clean lines and a sophisticated finish that makes a bold statement. The minimalist hardware complements the door's modern aesthetic while providing secure, smooth operation.

products.name: Rustic Pine Barn Door
products.description: Authentic barn-style sliding door made from reclaimed pine wood.
products.longDescription: Our Rustic Pine Barn Door brings farmhouse charm to any space. Crafted from reclaimed pine wood, each door has unique character and patina that tells a story. The sliding barn door hardware provides smooth operation while adding an industrial accent to the rustic design.

products.name: Craftsman Mahogany Door
products.description: Exquisite craftsman-style door with detailed woodwork and stained glass accents.
products.longDescription: Our Craftsman Mahogany Door is a masterpiece of traditional craftsmanship. Each door features intricate woodwork details and optional stained glass panels that create a stunning visual effect. The rich mahogany wood provides exceptional durability and a luxurious appearance that enhances any home's architectural style.

products.name: Contemporary Cherry Pocket Door
products.description: Space-saving pocket door crafted from premium cherry wood with modern hardware.
products.longDescription: Our Contemporary Cherry Pocket Door combines elegant design with practical functionality. The smooth pocket door mechanism allows for maximum space utilization, while the premium cherry wood provides a warm, inviting appearance. Modern hardware and finishes create a sophisticated look that works well in contemporary homes.

products.name: Traditional Oak French Doors
products.description: Elegant pair of French doors with tempered glass panels and solid oak frame.
products.longDescription: Our Traditional Oak French Doors bring classic European elegance to your home. Each pair features tempered glass panels that allow natural light to flow while maintaining privacy. The solid oak frame provides exceptional durability and a timeless appearance that enhances any architectural style.
